title: MacKenzie Scott’s Giving Transforming the Bezos Fortune
itunes:title: MacKenzie Scott’s Giving Transforming the Bezos Fortune
description:
Dr. Eric Toner, Senior Scholar at the Johns Hopkins Center for Health Security at the Bloomberg School of Public Health, provides a virus and vaccine update. Bloomberg Businessweek Editor Joel Weber and Bloomberg News Wealth Team Reporter Sophie Alexander talk about how MacKenzie Scott’s philanthropic efforts are transforming the Bezos fortune. Bloomberg Businessweek National Correspondent Josh Green discusses his piece “Biden Is Free to Move Left as the GOP Cracks Up Over Trump.” And we Drive to the Close with Philip Palumbo, CEO at Palumbo Wealth Management.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Doni Holloway. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
